entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
